module.name: class_of_connection_of_activity
module.keywords: module, connection, class, activity, topology, process plant

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application to record classes of connection between classes of activity.
The nature of a connection between individual activities may be specified by indicating a class of connection of which it is a member.

ul.li: the class of activity 'maintain mechanical equipment'; and
the class of activity 'operate mechanical equipment',

example.p: that indicates there is a flow of material objects, documents and information in both directions between the two activities, is a class_of_connection_of_activity.
The cardinality for this relationship is follows:

ul.li: a maintain mechanical equipment activity is connected to zero one or many operate mechanical equipment activities;
an operate mechanical equipment activity is connected to one or many maintain mechanical equipment activities.

purpose.note: The cardinality for the relationship is within the scope of the Cardinality_of_relationship application module.

li.p: a mapping between one class of activity and another that indicates the nature of a connection relationship between two individual activities.

li.note: A connection between individual activities is within the scope of the connection_of_individual_activity application module.

li.p: membership of a class of connection of activity.
li.note: Membership of a class of connection of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.

uof.name: Class_of_connection_of_activity
uof.description: The Class_of_connection_of_activity UoF identifies a class of connection of activity and defines the classes of activity that are connection.
